item.title: Sara add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "It's as if they have thinner boundaries separating them from other people's emotions and from the tragedies and cruelties of the world." -- Susan Cain

item.title: Sara add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "So stay true to your own nature. If you like to do things in a slow and steady way, don't let others make you feel as if you have to race. If you enjoy depth, don't force yourself to seek breadth. If you prefer single-tasking to multi-tasking, stick to your guns. Being relatively unmoved by rewards gives you the incalculable power to go your own way." -- Susan Cain
